messages.subject: Re: Just Sharing a Positive Unschooling Day..
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/26/2005 8:42:50 AM Eastern Daylight Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: What an  awful parent, self-loathing pretty much
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/26/2005 8:42:50 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:

What an awful parent,
self-loathing pretty much describes how I feel about
myself back then, I wish I could take it back.



************************************************

Keep in mind that for right now you are focusing on not-so-good choices you
made in the past as a parent. I am certain that you had lots and lots of
instances of being sweet, loving and supportive as a parent. Those led you to
where you are now. Forgive yourself. You've apologized to your son, and he has
forgiven you. Now move on and enjoy.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
